SelectUSA Greater China Road Show

May 18-29, 2015

Hong Kong, Shenzhen, Dongguan, Guangzhou, Shanghai, Shenyang, Dalian

Building on our tremendously successful Pearl River Delta Road Show (April 2014), the U.S. Consulates in Guangzhou, Hong Kong, Shanghai and Shenyang are thrilled to announce that the second edition of the hugely popular SelectUSA Investment Roadshow to China will take place May 18-29, 2015! During this expanded Road Show, participants will visit Hong Kong, Shenzhen, Dongguan, Guangzhou, Shanghai, Shenyang, and Dalian–an itinerary that will offer an unprecedented opportunity to meet with hundreds of potential Chinese investors! 

We look forward to seeing you in 2015 during the SelectUSA Greater China Road Show!
